Articles.Content:
I've played ksp since 0.16 but i can't figure out for the life of me how to get crew out of the lab

no option when i right click

no heads in the bottom right corner to press eva on

I NEED HELP
Left click on the hatch when it displays 'Crew Hatch' or similar. That should bring up a menu with everyone inside the lab, and you can select EVA to bring them out of the hatch.

Left click on the hatch when it displays 'Crew Hatch' or similar. That should bring up a menu with everyone inside the lab, and you can select EVA to bring them out of the hatch.

Yes this. Although sometimes it can be really hard to click on the hatch, so don't hesitate to move the camera around and slowly hover the mouse while searching for the right spot.
Another option is to hack the lab module so it has an IVA.

Another option is to hack the lab module so it has an IVA.

Awesome! I've not bothered to look at the code for these. Thanks!
